Key Match Events: Knicks struggled with offensive shooting, making only 4 three-pointers and 38.5% of their field goals
Isaiah Joe scored 31 points, including 8 three-pointers, and contributed to the Thunder's victory
Defensive lapses occurred due to the Knicks' poor performance
The game marked the Knicks' fourth loss in the past five games
Post-Match Reflections: Karl-Anthony Towns acknowledged that not every game will be perfect
Players recognized the need for consistent effort and defense
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Knicks' offensive struggles and defensive lapses were highlighted as a recurring issue
